long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Supercharge your Google Meet experience with GM Pro, the ultimate Chrome extension for enhancing chat functionality in your meetings! Whether you're a frequent user or just want to take your Meet experience to the next level, GM Pro offers a wide range of features designed to improve chat interaction, streamline communication, and provide advanced tools for both casual and professional use. 🚀

Key Features:
 - Enhanced Chat Interface 💬
    Upgrade to a feature-rich chat window that includes persistent chat history, even for late joiners.
 - Dark Mode for Chat 🌙
    Easily switch to dark mode for more comfort.
 - Auto Mic Muting 🎤
    Automatically mute your mic when entering a meeting.
 - Auto Camera Disabling 📷
    Automatically turn off your camera when you join a meeting for privacy.
 - Transcription Tab 📝
    Scroll back through full realtime meeting transcriptions.
 - Lobby Notifier 🔔
    Get a notification chime whenever someone joins the call, ensuring you never miss the start of a meeting.
 - Reactions to Messages 👍😂
    React to and see reactions on messages for more interactive chats.
 - Reply to Messages ✉️
    Quote and reply to messages for clearer communication.
 - GIF Search and Send 🎉
    Easily search for and send GIFs in the chat, adding a fun and expressive way to communicate.
 - Attendee Shuffling 🔄
    Pick one person from the attendee list or shuffle the entire participants list—perfect for meetings where everyone needs to take turns sharing, such as standups and retrospectives.

Why GM Pro?
GM Pro is continuously updated with new features and improvements based on user feedback and extensive testing. The extension is designed to seamlessly integrate into your Google Meet experience, adding powerful new tools while maintaining ease of use. 🔧✨

Latest Updates:
Transcription Feature 🆕: Now in beta, capture meeting transcriptions directly within the chat pane for easy reference and note-taking.
Bug Fixes & Improvements 🔄: Regular updates ensure stability and performance, with the latest version fixing various bugs and adding new features based on user requests.
Join the growing community of GM Pro users and transform the way you interact in Google Meet. Install now and discover what GM Pro can do for you! 🌟

Stay tuned for more exciting features and improvements in upcoming updates!
This updated version now includes all the important features you mentioned.
